title: H2X Global
description: H2X Global is an Australian automotive company that specializes in hydrogen fuel cell electric vehicles (FCEVs) and fuel cell electric generators, focusing on “back to base” logistic vehicle fleets such as buses, trucks, delivery vans, and taxis. We leverage hydrogen fuel cell technology to deliver zero-emission vehicles that maintain a longer range and faster refuelling in comparison to battery electric vehicles (BEVs).
